summary: The ego vehicle is approaching an intersection at night. There are other vehicles and a bus visible. The traffic light is red for the ego vehicle.
actions: Ego vehicle is moving forward. Other vehicles are stopped at the intersection. A bus is also stopped.
key_objects: Ego vehicle, bus, other vehicles, traffic light, intersection, overpass support pillars
next_action: Ego vehicle will likely stop at the red light.

summary: The ego vehicle is stopped at a red light at an intersection. A person lying on the crosswalk with a bicycle is visible. Other vehicles are waiting at the intersection. A scooter is approaching the crosswalk.
actions: Ego vehicle is stopped. Other vehicles are waiting. A scooter is approaching the crosswalk.
key_objects: Ego vehicle, other vehicles, traffic light, intersection, person lying on the crosswalk, bicycle, scooter
key_actions: Person lying on the crosswalk, scooter approaching the crosswalk
next_action: Ego vehicle will likely wait for the traffic light to turn green. The scooter will likely cross the crosswalk.
